name: Asteroid Blast!
description: Asteroid Blast is a game where you move your mouse up and down to dodge asteroids and get a good score. There are 3 difficulties: Slow, Fast, and Hyper. Fast is recommended for most players. It is my first game, so I hope you enjoy it :D Sorry, the screen is a little smaller in itch.io than in unity so it is a little close up, hope you don't mind.
